name: circuit-playground-wifi-esp8266
description: MakeCode extension, for ESP-01 wifi module connected to Circuit Playground

card.name: Esp-01 WiFi
card.description: WiFi and IoT on Circuit Playground? connect a low-cost hardware module Esp-01: you will be able to send and receive strings, interacting with IFTTT, Blynk, and every other RESTful app!
